title: Christmas 2018: Be Grateful.  And Keep Smiling
itunes:author: Jocko DEFCOR Network
itunes:subtitle: A letter written by Mrs. Eleanor Wimbish, Mother of Sgt. William R. "Spanky" Stocks, who was killed in action in a helicopter crash in Vietnam on Feb 13 1969.
